== Package ==
----
Main activity, as you can see in ECLIPSE, is defined in class OsmReader.java

  * OsmNavigator
    * src
      * com.android.osmNavigator
        # _Node.java_, stuff about osm format _<node>_ (id, lat, lon, _<tag>_)
        # _OpenStreetMap.java_
        # _OsmFileReader.java_
        # _OsmHandler.java_
        # _OsmReader.java_
        # _Tag.java_, store osm attributes "keys" and "values" in _<tag>_
        # _Way.java_
        # _WaySelect.java_, sub_activity
== Resources ==
----
  * OsmNavigator
    * res
      * _drawable_, contains .png images, logo and menu images
      * _layout_, android xml layout descriptor, see    [http://code.google.com/android/devel/ui/xml.html Android docs]
      * _raw_, would contains OSM files 
      * _values_, contains colors.xml descriptor
